workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.49753574549587193 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.36306677660730785 --weight-decay 6.797695819057159e-05 --lr 9.991052051242813e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 24724 --max-lr 0.00016913300222043837 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.27840011586659663 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.09125221808757189 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
